user.description: Fill in your AWS RDS username. If a password is provided, this field will serve as the master username. Otherwise, the IAM role will be used
user.title: Username

password.description: Fill in your master password. Notice that this field is required if you want to use a master username
password.title: Password

name.description: Fill in your AWS RDS database name
name.title: Database Name

host.description: Fill in your AWS RDS database host
host.title: Host

port.description: Fill in your AWS RDS database port
port.title: Port

region.description: Fill in your database region (e.g. us-west-2)
region.title: Region

aws-access-key-id.description: Fill in your AWS RDS access key id. If a password is not provided, this field will be required for IAM role authentication. Otherwise, it will be optional
aws-access-key-id.title: AWS Access Key ID

aws-secret-access-key.description: Fill in your AWS RDS secret access key. If a password is not provided, this field will be required for IAM role authentication. Otherwise, it will be optional
aws-secret-access-key.title: AWS Secret Access Key
